bibl.title: Discovery of the Famous Temple and Enclosure of Serapis at Alexandria. With an Explanation of the Enigmatic Inscriptions on the Serapeum Plaques of Ptolemy IV. (Supplément aux Annales du Service des Antiquités. Cahier 2.)

bibl.note: Pp. 95-112: Étienne Drioton, Plaques bilingues de Ptolémée IV.

Rowe Alan and Étienne Drioton, Discovery of the Famous Temple and Enclosure of Serapis at Alexandria. With an Explanation of the Enigmatic Inscriptions on the Serapeum Plaques of Ptolemy IV. (Supplément aux Annales du Service des Antiquités. Cahier 2.)
